channel.title: CVE Feed for Johnson Controls -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Johnson Controls -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-9049|2024-09-17T02:57:34.537Z -- johnson%20controls -- victor%20web%20client%20version%205.6%20and%20prior
item.description: A vulnerability in specified versions of American Dynamics victor Web Client and Software House C•CURE Web Client could allow an unauthenticated attacker on the network to create and sign their own JSON Web Token and use it to execute an HTTP API Method without the need for valid authentication/authorization. Under certain circumstances, this could be used by an attacker to impact system availability by conducting a Denial of Service attack.

item.title: CVE-2021-36207|2024-09-17T00:11:33.212Z -- johnson%20controls -- metasys%20ads%2Fadx%2Foas%20server
item.description: Under certain circumstances improper privilege management in Metasys ADS/ADX/OAS servers versions 10 and 11 could allow an authenticated user to elevate their privileges to administrator.

item.title: CVE-2021-27662|2024-09-17T00:31:51.342Z -- johnson%20controls -- kt-1
item.description: The KT-1 door controller is susceptible to replay or man-in-the-middle attacks where an attacker can record and replay TCP packets. This issue affects Johnson Controls KT-1 all versions up to and including 3.01

item.title: CVE-2022-21941|2024-09-17T01:51:30.183Z -- johnson%20controls -- istar%20ultra
item.description: All versions of iSTAR Ultra prior to version 6.8.9.CU01 are vulnerable to a command injection that could allow an unauthenticated user root access to the system.

item.title: CVE-2021-27664|2024-09-17T03:55:00.216Z -- johnson%20controls -- exacqvision%20web%20service
item.description: Under certain configurations an unauthenticated remote user could be given access to credentials stored in the exacqVision Server.

item.title: CVE-2021-36206|2024-09-17T03:13:44.088Z -- johnson%20controls -- cevas
item.description: All versions of CEVAS prior to 1.01.46 do not sufficiently validate user-controllable input and could allow a user to bypass authentication and retrieve data with specially crafted SQL queries.

item.title: CVE-2021-36201|2024-09-17T03:39:04.179Z -- johnson%20controls -- c%E2%80%A2cure%209000
item.description: Under certain circumstances a CCURE Portal user could enumerate user accounts in CCURE 9000 version 2.90 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2021-27657|2024-09-17T00:51:44.651Z -- johnson%20controls -- metasys
item.description: Successful exploitation of this vulnerability could give an authenticated Metasys user an unintended level of access to the server file system, allowing them to access or modify system files by sending specifically crafted web messages to the Metasys system. This issue affects: Johnson Controls Metasys version 11.0 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2018-10624|2024-09-17T00:11:43.873Z -- johnson%20controls -- metasys%20system
item.description: In Johnson Controls Metasys System Versions 8.0 and prior and BCPro (BCM) all versions prior to 3.0.2, this vulnerability results from improper error handling in HTTP-based communications with the server, which could allow an attacker to obtain technical information.

item.title: CVE-2021-36202|2024-09-17T01:50:52.203Z -- johnson%20controls -- metasys
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in Johnson Controls Metasys could allow an authenticated attacker to inject malicious code into the MUI PDF export feature. This issue affects: Johnson Controls Metasys All 10 versions versions prior to 10.1.5; All 11 versions versions prior to 11.0.2.

item.title: CVE-2021-27656|2024-09-17T03:23:48.351Z -- johnson%20controls -- exacqvision%20web%20service%20version%2020.12.2.0%20and%20prior
item.description: A vulnerability in exacqVision Web Service 20.12.2.0 and prior could allow an unauthenticated attacker to view system-level information about the exacqVision Web Service and the operating system.

item.title: CVE-2021-27665|2024-09-17T02:53:35.571Z -- johnson%20controls -- exacqvision%20web%20service
item.description: An unauthenticated remote user could exploit a potential integer overflow condition in the exacqVision Server with a specially crafted script and cause denial-of-service condition.

item.title: CVE-2021-27663|2024-09-17T03:38:42.161Z -- johnson%20controls -- cem%20systems%20ac2000
item.description: A vulnerability in versions 10.1 through 10.5 of Johnson Controls CEM Systems AC2000 allows a remote attacker to access to the system without adequate authorization. This issue affects: Johnson Controls CEM Systems AC2000 10.1; 10.2; 10.3; 10.4; 10.5.

item.title: CVE-2021-27658|2024-09-17T02:06:10.903Z -- johnson%20controls -- exacqvision%20enterprise%20manager
item.description: exacqVision Enterprise Manager 20.12 does not sufficiently validate, filter, escape, and/or encode user-controllable input before it is placed in output that is used as a web page that is served to other users.

item.title: CVE-2024-32931|2024-08-06T20:35:43.344Z -- johnson%20controls -- exacqvision
item.description: Under certain circumstances the exacqVision Web Service can expose authentication token details within communications.

item.title: CVE-2024-32758|2024-08-06T20:35:07.083Z -- johnson%20controls -- exacqvision
item.description: Under certain circumstances the communication between exacqVision Client and exacqVision Server will use insufficient key length and exchange

item.title: CVE-2024-32864|2024-08-05T19:10:10.819Z -- johnson%20controls -- exacqvision
item.description: Under certain circumstances exacqVision Web Services will not enforce secure web communications (HTTPS)

item.title: CVE-2024-32759|2024-08-02T02:20:35.254Z -- johnson%20controls -- software%20house%20c%E2%80%A2cure%209000
item.description: Under certain circumstances the Software House C●CURE 9000 installer will utilize weak credentials.

item.title: CVE-2024-32755|2024-08-02T02:20:35.243Z -- johnson%20controls -- american%20dynamics%20illustra%20essentials%20gen%204
item.description: Under certain circumstances the web interface will accept characters unrelated to the expected input.

item.title: CVE-2024-32752|2024-08-02T02:20:35.187Z -- johnson%20controls -- software%20house%20istar%20pro%2C%20icu
item.description: Under certain circumstances communications between the ICU tool and an iSTAR Pro door controller is susceptible to Machine-in-the-Middle attacks which could impact door control and configuration.

item.title: CVE-2024-32932|2024-08-02T02:27:52.390Z -- johnson%20controls -- american%20dynamics%20illustra%20essentials%20gen%204
item.description: Under certain circumstances the web interface users credentials may be recovered by an authenticated user.

item.title: CVE-2024-32861|2024-08-02T02:20:35.618Z -- johnson%20controls -- software%20house%20c%E2%80%A2cure%209000%20installer
item.description: Under certain circumstances the Software House C●CURE 9000 Site Server provides insufficient protection of directories containing executables.

item.title: CVE-2024-32754|2024-08-02T02:20:35.575Z -- johnson%20controls -- kantech%20kt1%20door%20controller%2C%20rev01
item.description: Under certain circumstances, when the controller is in factory reset mode waiting for initial setup, it will broadcast its MAC address, serial number, and firmware version. Once configured, the controller will no longer broadcast this information.

item.title: CVE-2024-32757|2024-08-02T02:20:35.566Z -- johnson%20controls -- american%20dynamics%20illustra%20essentials%20gen%204
item.description: Under certain circumstances unnecessary user details are provided within system logs

item.title: CVE-2024-32753|2024-08-02T02:20:35.268Z -- johnson%20controls -- tyco%20illustra%20pro%20gen%204%20cameras
item.description: Under certain circumstances the camera may be susceptible to known vulnerabilities associated with the JQuery versions prior to 3.5.0 third-party component

item.title: CVE-2024-32756|2024-08-02T02:20:35.182Z -- johnson%20controls -- american%20dynamics%20illustra%20essentials%20gen%204
item.description: Under certain circumstances the Linux users credentials may be recovered by an authenticated user.

item.title: CVE-2024-0912|2024-08-01T18:18:18.986Z -- johnson%20controls -- software%20house%20c%E2%80%A2cure%209000
item.description: Under certain circumstances the Microsoft® Internet Information Server (IIS) used to host the C•CURE 9000 Web Server will log Microsoft Windows credential details within logs. There is no impact to non-web service interfaces C•CURE 9000 or prior versions

item.title: CVE-2024-32861|2024-07-16T14:57:10.115Z -- johnson%20controls -- software%20house%20c%E2%80%A2cure%209000%20installer
